quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Opportunity is not your opponent—it is your ally, but it’s hard to see that because opportunity is often camouflaged and hidden among danger and chaos.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door
author: Milton Berle

quote: Sometimes opportunities float right past your nose. Work hard, apply yourself, and be ready. When an opportunity comes you can grab it.
author: Julie Andrews Edwards

quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
author: Seneca

quote: Chaos is another name for opportunity
author: I-Ching

quote: When I am ready for the opportunity, I get lucky.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your biggest opportunity probably lies under your own feet, in your current job, industry, education, experience or interests.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
author: Bobby Unser

quote: If you are faced with a lost opportunity, think of the shifting reality and be ready to catch it when it comes your way. This is the way reality functions.
author: Stephen Richards,  Be First: Achieve Every Dream

quote: Don’t wait for opportunity in front of a closed door—wander until you find the open one.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I've been lucky. Opportunities don't often come along. So, when they do, you have to grab them.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Opportunities? They are all around us ... There is power lying latent everywhere waiting for the observant eye to discover it.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Our lives are defined by opportunities, even the ones we miss.
author: Eric Roth,  The Curious Case of Benjamin Button Screenplay

quote: Opportunity may knock only once but temptation leans on the door bell
author: Oprah Winfrey,  Oprah Winfrey Speaks: Insights from the World's Most Influential Voice

quote: Our greatest opportunities are to let go and surrender to that which is greater than our egoistic needs and desires.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon,  Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: With every challenge you face, there is an opportunity hidden that will lead you towards the path of wealth and abundance.
author: Stephen Richards,  Be First: Achieve Every Dream

quote: Sometimes new opportunity means new opposition. Not everything God asks us to do will be comfortable.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Opportunity doesn't make appointments, you have to be ready when it arrives.
author: Tim Fargo

quote: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: The secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: God can turn the impossibile into possibilities. Possibilities become opportunities. Opportunities leads us one step closer to our dreams!
author: Anasia Nicole Hixon

quote: Procrastination is opportunity's natural assassin.
author: Victor Kiam

quote: I believe success is preparation, because opportunity is going to knock on your door sooner or later but are you prepared to answer that?
author: Omar Epps

quote: Opportunity Knocks: China When opportunity knocksthe Chinese make knock-offs.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Education exposes young people to a broader world, a world full of opportunity and hope.
author: Christine Gregoire

quote: A man wants to earn money in order to be happy, and his whole effort and the best of a life are devoted to the earning of that money. Happiness is forgotten; the means are taken for the end.
author: Albert Camus,  The Myth of Sisyphus and Other Essays

quote: Our most significant opportunities will be found in times of greatest difficulty.
author: Thomas S. Monson,  Pathways To Perfection: Discourses Of Thomas S. Monson

quote: I think if you show up and you work hard and you're straightforward, you can always create your own opportunities. I hope I'm right.
author: Cory Monteith

quote: Enjoying success requires the ability to adapt. Only by being open to change will you have a true opportunity to get the most from your talent.
author: Nolan Ryan

quote: You may not find the opportunity to succeed, but you can always find the opportunity to serve. Then serve to succeed.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Balancing hopes, desires and an appreciating of the possibilities with a clear-eyed assessment of the limitations: that is the art of choosing.
author: Sheena Iyengar

quote: If you can transcend from the dark rut of disempowered thinking to the bright light of an empowered agreement with reality, you will see opportunities not barriers. You will see the finish line, not the hurdles.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Sometimes the course of our lives depends on what we do or don't do in a few seconds, a heartbeat, when we either seize the opportunity, or just miss it. Miss the moment and you never get a chance again.
author: Aidan Chambers,  Dying to Know You

quote: Life, for the living, is a gift of opportunity; an exercise of the will to choose.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.
author: Francis Bacon,  The Essays

quote: The more you seek security, the less of it you have. But the more you seek opportunity, the more likely it is that you will achieve the security that you desire.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: There are people who can achieve huge success in life, while adding a bit of fun and a splash of colour to this increasingly grey world.
author: Peter James

quote: We have to rise above bad fortune. We have to be in the good and enjoy the good, study and work and adventure and friendship and community and love.
author: Joshua Prager

quote: Luck? I don’t know anything about luck. I’ve never banked on it and I’m afraid of people who do. Luck to me is something else: hard work - and realizing what opportunity is and what isn’t."— Lucille Ball
author: Lucille Ball

quote: A new day: Be open enough to see opportunities. Be wise enough to be grateful. Be courageous enough to be happy.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Life is a land of opportunity to love, live, and enjoy beauty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Sometimes, we are so attached to our way of life that we turn down wonderful opportunities simply because don't know what to do with it.
author: Paulo Coelho,  Like the Flowing River

quote: Creating a better futureRequires creativity in the present.
author: Matthew Goldfinger

quote: We can follow a steady upward course in a world of change without fear, welcoming opportunities
author: Henry B. Eyring

quote: Recognize that throughout this beautiful day,you have an incredible amount of opportunities to move your life into the direction you want it to go.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
